txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The Easterlings are a formidable foe that has long troubled us. No matter how many defeats we deliver upon them they keep returning to the field of battle. Now, they search Gerngarth for an edge in that battle. They reason that if they learn our past, they will be able to predict our responses.\n\n'We cannot give them this opportunity. Go to Gerngarth and drive the Easterlings from the ancient library. Be wary, though, they may have trolls with them.'
'More will come, but for now our ways and history are safe.'
'Are you ready to visit the ancient library of Gerngarth?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Easterlings are searching through Gerngarth for ancient Rohirric texts.
Defeated trolls and Easterlings in Gerngarth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat trolls and Easterlings in Gerngarth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Easterlings and trolls can be found in Gerngarth.\n\nWulfin asked you to venture to Gerngarth and defeat the Easterlings pillaging the ancient library.
Wulfin can be found in Harwick.\n\nWulfin will want to hear the library of Gerngarth is secure.
